about_the_game:
This DLC contains "Go Santa Go!" Quest.
Help Santa deliver his presents!

Objectives: Make presents for everyone! Note: Some may want more than one present.

Santa just figured that there aren't enough gifts made.
And there is so little time left.
We should hurry up and make more gifts!
detailed_description:
This DLC contains "Go Santa Go!" Quest.
Help Santa deliver his presents!

Objectives: Make presents for everyone! Note: Some may want more than one present.

Santa just figured that there aren't enough gifts made.
And there is so little time left.
We should hurry up and make more gifts!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
